frontmatter.title: Preparing a Noble Death
frontmatter.short: Love your life, perfect your life, beautify all things in your life. Seek to make your life long and its purpose in the service of your people. Prepare a noble death
frontmatter.keywords: data driven storytelling, data driven culture
